scripts.prerelease: cross-env CI=true yarn clean && yarn --frozen-lockfile && yarn test && node scripts/prerelease.js
scripts.test: yarn build:runtime && yarn test:unit && yarn test:portfolio && yarn test:web
scripts.clean: lerna exec rimraf lib && lerna exec rimraf build && lerna exec rimraf dist && lerna clean --yes && rimraf node_modules

_file.name: package
_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/portfolio",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.3.5",
  "description": "The Skypager Framework Monorepo",
  "main": "index.js",
  "resolutions": {
    "eslint-scope": "3.7.1"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node scripts/start.js",
    "build": "node scripts/build.js",
    "build:runtime": "skypager run-all runtime/test runtime/build --sequential",
    "build:all": "lerna run build",
    "watch": "node scripts/watch.js",
    "prettify": "node scripts/prettify.js",
    "new": "skypager create",
    "link:devDependencies": "node scripts/link-dev-dependencies.js",
    "console": "node scripts/console.js",
    "prerelease": "cross-env CI=true yarn clean && yarn --frozen-lockfile && yarn test && node scripts/prerelease.js",
    "release": "lerna publish patch --yes",
    "postrelease": "node scripts/postrelease.js && yarn deploy",
    "deploy": "lerna run deploy --stream && yarn deploy:website",
    "deploy:website": "node scripts/deploy-website.js",
    "test": "yarn build:runtime && yarn test:unit && yarn test:portfolio && yarn test:web",
    "test:unit": "mocha",
    "pretest:web": "node scripts/prepare-web-release.js",
    "test:web": "skypager start-and-test --start start:test:webserver --test test:web:build",
    "test:portfolio": "lerna run test --stream",
    "test:web:build": "mocha --file test/test.js test/web/**/*.spec.js",
    "start:test:webserver": "skypager serve public --hostname localhost",
    "postinstall": "node scripts/postinstall.js",
    "clean": "lerna exec rimraf lib && lerna exec rimraf build && lerna exec rimraf dist && lerna clean --yes && rimraf node_modules"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "Skypager"
  ],
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "workspaces": [
    "src/apps/*",
    "src/clients/*",
    "src/devtools/*",
    "src/runtime",
    "src/runtimes/*",
    "src/features/*",
    "src/helpers/*",
    "src/examples/*",
    "src/servers/*"
  ],
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/core": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-object-rest-spread": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/register": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.0.0",
    "better-docs": "^1.1.3",
    "cross-env": "^5.2.0",
    "husky": "^1.3.1",
    "jsdoc": "^3.5.5",
    "jsdoc-plugin-typescript": "^1.0.7",
    "jsdoc-to-markdown": "^4.0.1",
    "lerna": "^3.4.0",
    "lint-staged": "^7.3.0",
    "patch-package": "^6.0.2",
    "puppeteer": "^1.9.0"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "src/**/*.{js,json}": [
      "node scripts/pre-commit.js"
    ]
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "lint-staged"
    }
  }
}

_file.name: package
_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/apps-portfolio-browser",
  "version": "0.3.8",
  "description": "an api and application for browsing a portfolio",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "skypager": {
    "category": "apps",
    "buildFolder": "build",
    "webpack": {
      "build": "webpack.config.js",
      "scopeModules": false
    }
  },
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production skypager serve --esm",
    "dev": "cross-env NODE_ENV=development skypager serve --esm --hot",
    "prebuild": "skypager snapshot",
    "build": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "deploy": "node scripts/deploy.js --verbose",
    "watch": "skypager watch",
    "console": "skypager console",
    "pretest": "yarn build",
    "test": "cross-env NODE_ENV=test skypager test --webpack-config webpack.config.test.js --timeout 30000"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@skypager/helpers-document": "^0.3.2",
    "@skypager/node": "^0.3.8",
    "@skypager/portfolio-manager": "^0.3.8",
    "@skypager/web": "^0.3.6",
    "apollo-boost": "^0.1.23",
    "apollo-server": "^2.3.1",
    "apollo-server-express": "^2.3.1",
    "check-prop-types": "^1.1.2",
    "cookie-parser": "^1.4.3",
    "graphql": "^14.0.2",
    "graphql-schema-modules": "^0.0.3",
    "graphql-tools": "^4.0.3",
    "graphql-type-json": "^0.2.1",
    "prop-types": "^15.6.2",
    "react": "^16.5.2",
    "react-apollo": "^2.3.3",
    "react-dom": "^16.5.2",
    "react-hot-loader": "^4.3.11",
    "react-loadable": "^5.5.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^4.3.1",
    "react-semantic-ui-range": "^0.6.2",
    "react-treebeard": "^3.1.0",
    "semantic-ui-react": "^0.82.5"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@skypager/webpack": "^0.3.6"
  },
  "gitHead": "3afe91f6ff7fd3bff7fe47a351619d5281155cd9",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": []
}

    "build": "babel -d lib src",

  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "skypager": {
    "category": "tools",
    "buildFolder": "lib"
  }
}

    "category": "apps"

    "build": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js",

_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/runtime",
  "version": "0.3.6",
  "description": "universal javascript application runtime",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "browser": "lib/skypager-runtime.min.js",
  "react-native": "lib/skypager-runtime.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "yarn build:lib && yarn build:web",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "build:lib": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps --config-file ./babelrc -d lib src",
    "build:web": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "prepare": "yarn docs:api && yarn build",
    "docs:api": "skypager generate-api-docs",
    "test": "skypager test"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/polyfill": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.0.0",
    "lodash": "^4.17.4",
    "mobx": "3.3.1",
    "qbus": "^0.9.7",
    "uuid": "^3.0.1",
    "vm-browserify": "^1.1.0"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "github",
    "url": "https://github.com/skypager/skypager"
  },
  "skypager": {
    "apiDocs": [
      "src/runtime",
      "src/helpers/helper",
      "src/helpers/feature",
      "src/features/profiler",
      "src/features/vm",
      "src/registries/*",
      "src/utils/*"
    ],
    "webpack": {
      "babel": {
        "lodash": false
      }
    },
    "category": "runtimes"

packages.name: @skypager/lambda
packages.description: the skypager lambda runtime, offers a slimmed down node runtime for use in lambda like environments
packages.author: Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>

_file.name: package
_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/lambda",
  "version": "0.3.8",
  "description": "the skypager lambda runtime, offers a slimmed down node runtime for use in lambda like environments",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "build": "rimraf lib && babel --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "docs:api": "skypager generate-api-docs",
    "watch": "babel --watch --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "console": "skypager console",
    "prepare": "yarn docs:api && yarn build",
    "test": "mocha --require @babel/register --file test/test.js --timeout 10000 test/**/*.spec.js",
    "test:watch": "skypager test --webpack-config webpack.config.test.js --watch"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@skypager/helpers-client": "^0.3.2",
    "@skypager/runtime": "^0.3.6",
    "bluebird": "^3.5.0",
    "child-process-promise": "^2.2.1",
    "find-up": "^2.1.0",
    "fs-extra-promise": "^0.4.1",
    "micromatch": "^3.1.4",
    "mime": "^2.4.0",
    "minimatch": "^3.0.3",
    "semver": "^5.3.0",
    "minimist": "1.2.0"
  },
  "skypager": {
    "webpack": {
      "build": "webpack.config.js",
      "scopeModules": false
    },
    "category": "runtimes"
  },
  "gitHead": "3afe91f6ff7fd3bff7fe47a351619d5281155cd9",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": []
}

scripts.build: rimraf build && yarn build:lib && yarn build:web && cp -r lib build

_file.name: package
_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/react",
  "version": "0.3.6",
  "description": "",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "index.js",
  "module": "lib/index.js",
  "browser": "lib/skypager-runtimes-react.min.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "skypager serve",
    "build": "rimraf build && yarn build:lib && yarn build:web && cp -r lib build",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "build:lib": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps --config-file ./babelrc -d lib src",
    "watch:lib": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps --config-file ./babelrc -d lib src --watch",
    "build:web": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "watch:web": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js --watch",
    "prepare": "yarn build",
    "test": "mocha --require @babel/register --file test/test.js --timeout 10000 test/**/*.spec.js",
    "test:watch": "skypager test --webpack-config webpack.config.test.js --watch"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.3.1",
    "@skypager/features-browser-vm": "^0.3.6",
    "@skypager/runtime": "^0.3.6",
    "prop-types": "^15.6.2",
    "react": "^16.7.0",
    "react-dom": "^16.7.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^4.3.1"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "github",
    "url": "https://github.com/skypager/skypager"
  },
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io",
  "gitHead": "3afe91f6ff7fd3bff7fe47a351619d5281155cd9",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "skypager": {
    "category": "runtimes",
    "buildFolders": [
      "lib",
      "build"
    ]
  }
}

_file.name: package
